segments.text: It's quit a big cafeteria , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I usually have my lunch here . The food is tasty and they offer a big variety .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's line up . The steak is very inviting . I'll have it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll have ham and egg with French fries . What dessert do you want ?
segments.speaker: S2
